I am an **Spatial Data Scientistic** in development, working in infeccios diseases spatial modeling , spatial statistic and geovisualization inside <b>Health Innovation Lab - Cayetano Heredia Peruvian, Lima-Peru</b>. My primary research involves of the spatial data analysis and spatial - temporal modeling, addition the use different technology of geographic Information of open source and free.
